name: RING LANCER
description:
LUDUM DARE 47 JAM ENTRY

@Juegoman - code, art, sounds@Lazenman - art, music

Fight to survive as you are Stuck in a Loop full of deadly robots.

Controls

  • A and D to move left and right
  • W to run faster
  • S to walk
  • double tap A or D to dash in the direction. Note that there is a cooldown.
  • click on the screen to fire

Get to 40000 score for a surprise.
